price: 158. Dus de bestraffing kwam over hen. Waarlijk, hierin is zeker een teken maar de meesten van hen waren geen gelovigen.
arabic: فَأَخَذَهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابُۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَةٗۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكۡثَرُهُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: fa-akhadhahumu al-ʿadhābu inna fī dhālika laāyatan wamā kāna aktharuhum mu'minīna
